prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Papers of William Faulkner, Accession #7278-e , Special Collections Dept., University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection was a gift from Mrs. Linton R. Massey on May 10, 1982.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of manuscripts and a printed copy of Faulkner in the University, edited by Frederick L. Gwynn and Joseph Blotner.

did.unittitle: Faulkner in the University, edited by Frederick L. Gwynn and Joseph Blotner 1966 June

did.unittitle: "Faulkner in Hollywood" by Joseph Blotner ca. 1967
Faulkner in the University, edited by Frederick L. Gwynn and Joseph Blotner 1968 Aug 20

scopecontent.p: With autograph notation and an inscription to Linton Massey
